info.title: Devic.ai Public API
info.description: Devic.ai is an AI platform that allows you to create, manage, and use AI agents for various tasks.
info.x-summary: Public API for interacting with Devic.ai platform

tags.name: Agents
tags.description: Endpoints related to AI agents and their operations

tags.description: Endpoints for interacting with assistants and their specializations

ApprovalStatus.description: Status of an execution awaiting approval

name.description: Name of the tool or function (for tool messages)

tool_call_id.description: Unique identifier for the tool call

agentId.description: Unique identifier for the associated agent

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the thread was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the thread was last updated

metadata.description: Custom metadata associated with the thread

cost.description: Total cost accumulated by this thread

metadata.description: Custom metadata to associate with the thread

async.description: Whether to execute the thread asynchronously

comment.description: Optional comment about the approval decision

evaluatorModel.description: Identifier for the model used to evaluate the agent

enabled.description: Whether automatic evaluation is enabled for this agent

feedback.description: Detailed feedback or explanation of the evaluation

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the evaluation was created

totalCost.description: Total cost accumulated by the agent

identifier.description: Unique identifier for the assistant specialization

description.description: Detailed description of what the specialization does

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the specialization was created

chatUid.description: Unique identifier for the chat session

assistantIdentifier.description: Identifier for the assistant specialization used

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the chat was created

metadata.description: Custom metadata associated with the chat

messages.description: Messages to process, usually including the latest user message

chatUid.description: Optional chat UID to continue an existing conversation

fromDate.description: Start date for filtering chat histories

toDate.description: End date for filtering chat histories

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the health status was checked

post.summary: Create a new thread for an agent
post.description: Creates a new execution thread for the specified agent. Threads allow you to run agent tasks, manage their state, and track associated costs.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: UUID of the agent for which to create the thread

requestBody.description: Payload to create a new thread

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Retrieves a list of execution threads associated with the specified agent. This can be used for monitoring and debugging purposes.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: UUID of the agent whose threads should be listed

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter threads by status

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of threads to return (pagination)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of threads to skip (pagination offset)

200.description: List of threads for the specified agent

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific thread, including its status, metadata, and message history.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread to retrieve

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

patch.description: Updates the status or metadata of a specific thread. This can be used to pause, resume, or modify thread metadata.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread to update

requestBody.description: Fields to update in the thread

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

post.description: Approves or rejects a thread execution that is awaiting approval. This is part of the human-in-the-loop workflow.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread awaiting approval

404.description: Thread not found or not awaiting approval

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

post.description: Marks a thread as completed. This can be used to signal the end of an execution, especially in manual or custom workflows.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread to complete

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

post.description: Pauses an ongoing thread. This can be useful to temporarily stop execution while waiting for external events.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread to pause

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

post.description: Resumes a previously paused thread and continues its execution.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread to resume

404.description: Thread not found or not paused

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

post.description: Triggers an evaluation run for the specified thread. This uses the evaluation configuration defined for the associated agent.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread to evaluate

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.summary: Get latest evaluation for a thread
get.description: Retrieves the most recent evaluation result for the specified thread.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread whose latest evaluation should be retrieved

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Retrieves all evaluations associated with the specified thread, ordered by creation date.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread whose evaluations should be listed

200.description: List of evaluations for the thread

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.summary: Get a specific evaluation by ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific evaluation, including score and feedback.

parameters.name: threadId
parameters.description: UUID of the thread associated with the evaluation

parameters.name: evaluationId
parameters.description: UUID of the evaluation to retrieve

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.summary: Get evaluation configuration for an agent
get.description: Retrieves the evaluation configuration associated with the specified agent.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: UUID of the agent whose evaluation config should be retrieved

404.description: Agent not found or evaluation config not set

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

put.summary: Update evaluation configuration for an agent
put.description: Creates or updates the evaluation configuration for the specified agent.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: UUID of the agent whose evaluation config should be updated

requestBody.description: New evaluation configuration for the agent

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.summary: Get daily cost breakdown for an agent
get.description: Retrieves daily cost entries for the specified agent over a configurable time range.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: UUID of the agent whose daily costs should be retrieved

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to include in the cost breakdown

200.description: Daily cost breakdown for the specified agent

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.summary: Get monthly cost breakdown for an agent
get.description: Retrieves monthly cost entries for the specified agent over a configurable time range.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: UUID of the agent whose monthly costs should be retrieved

parameters.name: months
parameters.description: Number of months to include in the cost breakdown

200.description: Monthly cost breakdown for the specified agent

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.summary: Get cost summary for an agent
get.description: Retrieves a summary of the total cost for the specified agent, including optional breakdown by category.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: UUID of the agent whose cost summary should be retrieved

200.description: Cost summary for the specified agent

parameters.description: Identifier of the assistant specialization to retrieve

post.summary: Process a message with an assistant specialization
post.description: Sends messages to the specified assistant specialization and returns its response. You can provide a chatUid to continue an existing conversation.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the assistant specialization to use

requestBody.description: Messages and optional chat context for the assistant

200.description: Assistant response and updated chat context

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Retrieves the full message history for a specific chat with an assistant specialization.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the assistant specialization

parameters.name: chatUid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the chat session

404.description: Chat or assistant specialization not found

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.summary: List chat histories for a specific assistant specialization
get.description: Retrieves chat histories associated with a particular assistant specialization.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the assistant specialization

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of chat histories to return

parameters.name: offset

post.description: Retrieves chat histories across all assistant specializations, with support for filtering by date range, metadata, and assistant identifier.
